title: Sun Wukong Shares His Peach

scenes.text: Sun Wukong sits under a peach tree on Flower Fruit Mountain. He has a big, juicy peach. A tiny bird chirps nearby.
scenes.imagePrompt: A spunky monkey sitting cross-legged under a lush peach tree with pink blossoms on a sunny mountain peak, holding a large ripe peach, with a small colorful bird perched on a nearby branch, featuring Sun Wukong (Monkey King): Spunky anthropomorphic male golden macaque, confident mischievous boyish grin, masculine jawline, bright golden fur, fiery-gold eyes. Strong muscular build, broad shoulders. Wearing golden chainmail armor over red tunic, tiger-skin kilt, black trousers, black combat boots. Golden fillet headband with two extremely long red pheasant feathers curving back. Holding red-and-gold iron staff. Style: Premium 3D animation, Pixar-style character design, vibrant colors, expressive studio lighting, 8k resolution.

scenes.text: Sun Wukong smiles. He breaks the peach in half. He gives one piece to the little bird. They eat together and are happy!
scenes.imagePrompt: A heartwarming scene on a mountain with waterfalls and green trees in the background, showing a monkey offering half a peach to a delighted small bird who flutters near his outstretched hand, both appearing joyful, featuring Sun Wukong (Monkey King): Spunky anthropomorphic male golden macaque, confident mischievous boyish grin, masculine jawline, bright golden fur, fiery-gold eyes. Strong muscular build, broad shoulders. Wearing golden chainmail armor over red tunic, tiger-skin kilt, black trousers, black combat boots. Golden fillet headband with two extremely long red pheasant feathers curving back. Holding red-and-gold iron staff. Style: Premium 3D animation, Pixar-style character design, vibrant colors, expressive studio lighting, 8k resolution.

description: Sun Wukong, the legendary monkey, demonstrates the joy of sharing when he splits his delicious peach with a tiny bird on Flower Fruit Mountain. This heartwarming tale teaches young readers about friendship and generosity through a simple act of kindness between two unlikely companions.
cover_prompt: Sun Wukong, a spunky anthropomorphic male golden macaque with bright golden fur, fiery-gold eyes, confident mischievous boyish grin, and masculine jawline, sits beneath a lush peach tree on Flower Fruit Mountain. He has a strong muscular build with broad shoulders, wearing golden chainmail armor over red tunic, tiger-skin kilt, black trousers, and black combat boots. His golden fillet headband has two extremely long red pheasant feathers curving back. He holds a big juicy peach broken in half, sharing one piece with a tiny colorful bird perched on his hand. His red-and-gold iron staff rests beside him. Both character and bird are eating together with joyful expressions, surrounded by pink peach blossoms and ripe peaches hanging from branches above.
